response.overview: Edmond Dantes becomes the target of a sinister plot and is arrested on his wedding day for a crime he did not commit. After 14 years in the island prison of Château d’If, he manages a daring escape. Now rich beyond his dreams, he assumes the identity of the Count of Monte-Cristo and exacts his revenge on the three men who betrayed him.
response.tagline: This is not vengeance, this is justice.
response.title: The Count of Monte Cristo

cast.name: Pierre Niney
cast.character: Edmond Dantès / The Count of Monte Cristo

cast.name: Laurent Dassault
cast.character: un convive du repas chez les Morcef

release_dates.note: Two Riversides Film and Art Festival
